sentence.Network_en: A defeasible interest is insurable, as also is a contingent interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 可撤销的利益是保险利益, 偶然的利益亦然.

PerfectNetExp.abs: defeasance 废止defeasible 可废止的defeat 击败
defeasance 作废defeasible 可作废的defeasible 可作废的可取消的
...法定所有权（Quiritary）和衡平所有权（bonitary）之间的区分。但这种看法只有在涉及到“可取消的”（defeasible）衡平所有权人时才是正确的。在衡平所有权为不可取消时，法定的和衡平的“所有权人”都不拥有独立的财产权资.
2007年5月28日 -  defeasible 可作废的可取消的 defeat 打破 defeat 作废打破 defecate 澄清 defect of contact 触点缺陷 defect 亏量 defect 缺陷 defection 缺点;过失.

A defeasible claim to an estate ., 对地产的宣告无效的要求.
defeasance废止，废除defeasance clause废除条款defeat败诉
可构成罪行的疏忽 culpable negligence可废除权益 defeasible interest可征收 leviable
可潜水船舶；视差角；星位角 X可取消利益 defeasible interest可确定之雷达判别区 PIRAZ

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Anglo-Norman French from the stem of Old French desfesant 'undoing' (see also defeasance)

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being annulled or voided or terminated;

sentences.sentence: "a claim to an estate may be defeasible so long as the claimant is under 21 and unmarried"
